text: Until Dawn is an upcoming American horror movie. It is expected to be released on April 25, 2025. It was directed by David F. Sandberg and stars by Ella Rubin, Michael Cimino, Odessa A'zion, Ji-young Yoo, Belmont Cameli, Maia Mitchell, and Peter Stormare. It is based on the 2015 video game Until Dawn. The movie follows Clover and her friends as they stay at a cabin in the middle of the wilderness and are haunted by a spirit. Principal photography began on August 5, 2024 in Budapest and finished on October 4. == Cast == ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2025 movies Category:2020s horror movies Category:2020s English-language movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies based on video games Category:Upcoming movies Category:Movies set in Budapest
title: Until Dawn (movie)
